servinfo.title: Front Strut Assembly Disassembly and Assembly

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Front Strut Assembly Removal and Installation

attention1.ptxt: Use a regular coil spring compressor and follow the operation procedure described in the Instruction Manual.
Otherwise, spring might come off and injure.

s1.ptxt: Attach special tool (A) to coil spring as shown. Turn special tool bolts alternately until coil spring tension is released. Rotate the strut around its axis to confirm that the coil spring is released or not.
While keeping coil spring compressed, remove strut nut with special tools as shown.

servinfosub.title: Assembly
servinfosub.ptxt: For assembly, reverse disassembly procedure, noting the following instructions.

s1.ptxt: Compress coil spring with special tool (A) until total length becomes about 310 mm (12.2 in.) as shown.
Install bump stopper onto strut rod. For installing direction, refer to the figure in Front Strut Assembly Components .
Install compressed coil spring to strut, and place coil spring end (2) onto spring lower seat (1) as shown.

attention3.ptxt: End of coil spring must not interfere with step of spring lower seat.

s1.ptxt: Pull strut rod as far up as possible and use care not to allow it to retract into strut.
Attach coil spring seat to coil spring upper seat and then install strut dust cover firmly.
Install coil spring upper seat with strut dust cover on coil spring and then spring upper seat (1) aligning “OUT” mark (3) on spring upper seat and center of strut bracket (2).
Install bearing (3), strut support (2) and strut nut (1) in this sequence.
Tighten strut nut (1) holding stud with special tools.
